Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: It‚Äôs a food truck. Good warm and tasty food. They were on time with the food. Near by there is a metro station and this place has enough parking space for vehicles. You can even find different food truck for different cuisines.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Having tried both the Biryani and Tikka Masala, the portions are on the slightly smaller size but compensated by exquisite flavor, 9/10 overall. They've been quick and reliably great quality. Can't wait to try more!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: I got hooked on Indian Food while living in UK and am always in seach of good curry.  This place did a great job with serving up some fine food.  Wish I lived closer to them as I would eat here often.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: I only have a couple bites left in the photo. Oops. This was the paneer tikka masala. Sooo delicious! Everything I've tried here is the bomb.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: There seriously is no Indian food east of this location. Go ahead check I'll wait. It's simple. It's local. The butter chicken is enough for two with a side of rice. ‚Ä¶

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: I ordered chicken Tikka Masala here and it was so yummy. We could smell all of the delicious aromas from this cart when we walked by and it was just irresistible. ü§§We also ordered cheese naan and mango lassi and both were really tasty. The service was friendly.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Hands down the best Indian food I have had in Portland. The Lamb saag and paneer tikka  masala were incredible and the pakora batter had great flavor. A real hidden gem, I will be back for more.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: This is the best Indian food I have ever eaten. I tried the Chicken tikka, raita, garlic naan, mango lassi, lamb korma, and rice. All of it is well prepared and super tasty. ‚Ä¶

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Nice portions for a good price. I had the butter chicken which had nice mild spice and very creamy. They seem to get very busy, but the food is worth the wait. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: We had it delivered, but we'll be there soon to get more and meet the outstanding chefs! It was SO GOOD!  10 ‚≠ê!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Food truck near Gresham, nice selection and in truck tandoor grill to get the perfect tandoori Bread. We had Paneer tikka curry, Dal Tadka and assorted fritter platter. Generous portions, great tasting food at reasonable price. They have common seating area for all the food trucks in the place.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: This food truck serves very tasty food with very generous portion size. Every curry/entry will come up with rice bowl and that should be more than enough. We tried Chana masala and kadai paneer, both are very good. All in all, I recommend this one üëå

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: So yummy! I ordered ahead. Food was ready and so delicious. Reasonably priced. Will visit again

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: I got a great Tikka masala. There was enough to eat 2 good size meals. The price was fair for the amount and quality of the food.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Haven't eating here before personally but wife got around $20 worth of food and got absolutely hooked up, servings can feed 5 adultsü§Ø She really liked it also, so recommend if you like India foodüëç

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Delicious food, friendly and helpful service, I would eat here again! The lamb in coconut curry was tender and the veggie samosas were very flavorful. Great selection of vegetarian and meat dishes, the chickpea curry was also spiced well making a full course meal to share with family.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Yep it‚Äôs legit. Lamb was tender not that tough mutton you get at some places. Complex flavors in our entrees. Good Basmati rice.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Wow, some of the best Indian food I've had (and I've had a lot!).  Tender meat, crispy flavorful samosas...I could go on and on. Very sweet and friendly staff.  I will be going back again and again ‚ù§

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Delicious chicken Tikka masala and garlic Naan bread.   Portions are large.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: This is some of the best Indian food I‚Äôve ever had. Love this place and I will be back frequently. Super friendly staff who was up front about the wait. The wait on a busy night was well worth it!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Really good food! The lamb wrap is amazing and the butter chicken is so bomb. The naan topped off everything! I highly recommend coming here!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: This cart is the best choice for Indian food east of 205. Since we love Indian food we come here a lot. We love the roti, the Chana masala, the veggie korma and the seasonal veggie curry. If you don‚Äôt specify the spice level he will make it ‚Ä¶

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Best Indian I‚Äôve found in the city! So delish!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: The food is not that great especially biryani. Thats not biryani. Its a kind of gravy rice. But they are calling it as biryani. When we asked they said, ‚Äúits how we do it‚Äù. They are spoiling the name Indian style Biryani. The staff is also ‚Ä¶

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Very possibly the best Indian food I've ever had. I've gotten six different things off the menu and they all were incredible, so I doubt you could go wrong here.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: This is a wonderful food cart, the food has consistently been great and I‚Äôm so grateful to have Indian food in Sandy!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Delicious Indian food! Very flavorful. You can call ahead to order. Vegetarian choices available. Best Chana Masala I have ever had.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: The lamb wrap was amazing, kind of like the convenience of a burrito but the flavors of India

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Food was great! Pretty sure he gave my food to a grub hub guy that brought it back several minutes later. Other than that was good.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Food truck with great service. Service was very accommodating and the food was good. It seems like the place they are located is not for late night and everything else in the food truck park was shutdown by 8pm. But the Indian food was good.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Food is always delicious and they have a wide variety of naans to choose from. The service is always prompt and friendly. These folks work hard!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Excellent. So happy to have great quality, great tasting Indian food in Gresham

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Looked good, but I didn't eat there yet. I definitely plan on it though!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Great biryani and butter chicken. Can't wait to go back and try more!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: This place is the best Indian food in Oregon ( and we‚Äôve tried a lot !) .  Everything is so flavorful and fresh. They are super nice people , as well .

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Made a special trip to try this place. Solid choices. Good food.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: This has fast become a go to. Tasty food and friendly service. It‚Äôs great to have good Indian food in Gresham.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: I specifically asked for a non spicy dish and he sold me one.  It was extremely spicy.  I told him, and he was deck in response.  Don't go here.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Super delicious foods,their hash tag isn't Flavor of India for no reason. Highly recommend

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Great food....takes a bit longer than other carts but it's fresh and cooked on order

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: I got the chicken wrap and cheese nann. They were amazing! I will be going back soon.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Resteraunt quality food from a food truck. Could not be more impressed with how good this stuff is. Try the Garlic Basil Naan

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: This is the platonic ideal of tandoori chicken. Onions were PERFECT and delicious.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Didn't realize that its a food truck but the food was super tasty....This is a hidden gem for sure..:)

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Good food, call ahead though.

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Amazing food! Have yet to have a bad dish...the samosas are to die for!

Name: Flavours of India
Review Text: Tikki and Vindaloo are phenomenal. Reminds me of good London take away.
